title: This New Axle Standard Could Save Your Old Quick-Release Wheels from the Scrap Heap: Taipei Cycle Show 2025
content:
TA5 lets you use QR hubs on thru-axle frames on new bikes, including with SRAM UDH. Is this the rare good new standard?
